elements: Styled html elements used as building blocks of modules and throughout the website.
helpers: Various helpers for single element quick fixes. Helper classes should be used anywhere at anytime with no dependencies or over specific styling e.g., text-align: center; with a helper class of .u-text-center All helper classes are prefixed with the 'u-' namespace('U' for utility) for readability purposes for developers.
modules: Styled and re-usable components comprised of multiple elements that can stand alone providing content and allowing interaction for the user.
